    Modelling, Simulation & Code:

    1. Modelling

    1.1 Crystal Model - Aqua

    Made this model from scratch on Blender+Cycles as a fun project on scientific simulations. (Inspired by Ducky3d’s amazing work).
    BlenderGuru, Ducky3d, CGForge are some awesome resources for those wanting to learn!
